bug.short_desc: Spurious horizontal scroll bars in table

long_desc.thetext:
Still present in trunk post 0.8 (as of 16459)
This can be seen on at least one of the online examples: http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/demobrowser/#treevirtual-TreeVirtual_Multiple_Columns.html
Notice how the columns have scrollbars even though they shouldn't be needed (they were autosized after all):
I'm not 100% sure it's the same bug, but it sure looks similar.

Yes, this was initially posted as a 0.8 bug. This did not occur in 0.7 (at least traditionally; I don't know if some recent change had affected it).
Derrell

There is another bug related to problems with multiple columns (#1374) that may be appropriate to review at the same time.
Derrell
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
